query:
UPDATE tasks 
SET assignedTo = CAST(CONCAT('[', assignedTo, ']') AS JSON)
WHERE assignedTo IS NOT NULL 
  AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) = 'INTEGER';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2YxFwjaS6n4EGE7.031ea3147ddd --database 5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX --execute UPDATE tasks 
SET assignedTo = CAST(CONCAT('[', assignedTo, ']') AS JSON)
WHERE assignedTo IS NOT NULL 
  AND JSON_TYPE(assignedTo) = 'INTEGER';
